The Beast follows their truth and their: The Beast follows their truth and their passions, which puts them in conflict with civilization and civilized norms. Unless they give up what makes them special and powerful, they cannot make themself acceptable to that civilized society. Their central conflict is living their truth versus fitting in with a dominant social order. Example Archetypes: Ranger Between Worlds, Bitten, Raised by Beasts
The Chosen playbook revolves around spec: The Chosen playbook revolves around special status, relationships across social strata, and the crushing expectations of fate, family, or the adoring public. Their central conflict is inner truth versus crushing social expectations. Example Archetypes: Magical Princess, Pop Idol, Chosen One
They keep telling you that you have a De: They keep telling you that you have a Destiny, but it’s not what your heart truly desires. What is it?
You may fulfill your Destiny in the cour: You may fulfill your Destiny in the course of play, or reject it so firmly that you no longer feel pressure to fulfill it. This deserves a climactic scene either way, and trying to reject your Destiny draws the full wrath of your Aspects and those pressing you to fulfill it. Afterwards, choose a new Destiny, adopt a new playbook, or live happily ever after.
Choose two Heroic Aspects and two Tragic: Choose two Heroic Aspects and two Tragic Aspects from the following lists. When you act in accordance with one of your Aspects, check it off and take +1 forward. If it’s a Tragic Aspect, also mark XP. When all four Aspects are checked off, describe how your Destiny grows ever nearer, then erase the check marks and begin again.

The Devoted is a selfless protector, com: The Devoted is a selfless protector, committed to a person or a cause. Their central conflict lies in pitting this devotion against self-care. Example Archetypes: Sidekick, Champion, Protective Friend
Choose a Devotion from the example lists: Choose a Devotion from the example lists or invent one of your own. What three tenets of your Devotion have you found yourself tempted to violate?
Mark a Condition if you act contrary to: Mark a Condition if you act contrary to your Devotion, for instance by violating its tenets or disobeying a superior.
When you Defy Disaster, you may bring a: When you Defy Disaster, you may bring a subject of your Devotion with you safely.
To a cause: Freedom, vengeance, justice,: To a cause: Freedom, vengeance, justice, love, the gay agenda. To a person: A PC, a liege, an idol. To a higher power: A god, a sexy dragon, a sentient planet.
When you face a superior foe on behalf o: When you face a superior foe on behalf of your Devotion, you may roll +Conditions (the number of Conditions you have marked) instead of the normal stat to Fight or to Defy Disaster that’s about to befall someone else.
When you’re Smitten with someone, you ma: When you’re Smitten with someone, you may treat them as a subject of your Devotion. Also, when you take action to help them be romantic with someone other than you, mark XP.
You may mark a Condition to prevent a Co: You may mark a Condition to prevent a Condition being inflicted on another. When you do, mark XP, and you may only clear that Condition by taking the associated destructive action. Mark it with an asterisk to remind yourself. Also, your Conditions only cause a –1 penalty to the associated basic moves (instead of –2).
When you Fight the enemy of your Devotio: When you Fight the enemy of your Devotion, you can suffer a Condition to choose an additional option from the Fight move, even if you roll a 6-. You can inflict a Condition a second time within a single Fight move this way.
When you Defy Disaster that’s about to b: When you Defy Disaster that’s about to befall someone else, you can either gain a String on them or ask one of the following questions, even if you roll a 6-. You can only gain one String per scene in this way on any given person.
How do you feel about my Devotion?: How do you feel about my Devotion?
What secret pain lies in your heart?: What secret pain lies in your heart?
When you Entice someone while extolling: When you Entice someone while extolling the virtues of your Devotion or invoking its authority, you may roll +Spirit instead of +Heart. A superior in your Devotion gains a String on you, representing your dependence.
When you touch someone as part of Emotio: When you touch someone as part of Emotional Support, you heal their physical ailments. Tell them how your Devotion sustains you; they mark an XP if they validate your Devotion, and you gain a String on them if they criticize it.
Once per scene, when you forgive your De: Once per scene, when you forgive your Devotion for abusing you or make excuses for obvious problems with your Devotion, take +1 forward or mark XP. Also, once per scene, when you learn that another PC thinks your Devotion is problematic and you don’t defend it, mark a Condition and give them a String on you.

This move is not available for other pla: This move is not available for other playbooks.
The Infamous once participated in wicked: The Infamous once participated in wicked deeds, but they’ve become fiercely righteous in trying to atone. Their central conflict arises from the lasting consequences of their past actions and beliefs versus their new convictions. Will they repair the harm they caused, will they seek forgiveness, or will they despair? Will they find a new place to belong? Example Archetypes: Former Villain, Escaped Henchperson, Veteran of Dishonor
You’ve hurt people, and they have no obl: You’ve hurt people, and they have no obligation to forgive you or engage with you.
Before defining Relationships in charact: Before defining Relationships in character creation, propose a wicked past that you think could be forgiven, and ask each PC this question:
If anyone hesitates or can’t answer the: If anyone hesitates or can’t answer the question, revisit your past and tone it down. You can tone down the gravity of your backstory by reducing the severity of your deeds or the agency you had in enacting them. Afterwards, answer these questions:
What circumstances or subsequent deeds c: What circumstances or subsequent deeds could make it possible to forgive this past?
What personal growth are you proud of?: What personal growth are you proud of?
What about your past causes you the most: What about your past causes you the most grief?
You swore to never again perform certain: You swore to never again perform certain actions that could lead to harm. What are they? Examples include: Lying, stealing, accepting someone’s love, drawing blood, or breaking a promise. If you break your vow, you Stagger. Then decide whether to keep the vow or abandon it.

Someone watching comes to the worst poss: Someone watching comes to the worst possible conclusion

When you give up an advantage on someone: When you give up an advantage on someone dangerous because you believe they can mend their wicked ways, you can ask a question as if you’d Figured Them Out.

When you expose the hypocrisy of someone: When you expose the hypocrisy of someone who is supposedly virtuous, roll +Daring:
Gain a String on them and choose 1: Gain a String on them and choose 1

The Nature Witch is deeply connected to: The Nature Witch is deeply connected to their environment and less experienced when it comes to people. They’re either new to socializing or are newly exploring what it feels like to socialize as their true self. Their central conflict revolves around the growth that their explorations will require from them and those who love them. Example Archetypes: Oblivious Horse Girl, Beacon of Kindness, Plant Geek Babygay
Dealing with people feels new to you and: Dealing with people feels new to you and you might be awkward, but you want to learn. What better way to learn than by doing?
Choose four Trials from the list. When y: Choose four Trials from the list. When you complete a chosen Trial, mark it and choose one: mark XP, clear a Condition, or take a String on someone involved. When your four chosen Trials are all fulfilled, reflect on what you’ve learned about yourself and pick four more. If you complete the entire list, choose the ones that meant the most to you and then evolve into a new form of life inspired by those experiences. Adopt a new playbook, remain a Nature Witch, or retire to live happily ever after.
Ride a fantastical creature. Win a duel. Go somewhere no person has tread before. Fall in love. Stick up for yourself, though it breaks someone’s heart. Lose someone you care about. Befriend someone very different from you. Liberate something dangerous. Receive a rare gift from someone you respect. Experience an altered state with a friend. Fail at something that means the world to you. Reject a conviction you once held. Extend kindness to someone who doesn’t deserve it. Achieve a lost cause. Throw away something comfortable to pursue a dream. Kiss someone dangerous. Forgive someone who deserves forgiveness. Trust someone with your secrets, only to be betrayed. Shock someone with an unwelcome truth. Earn forgiveness for a misdeed.

You may give the listener a String on th: You may give the listener a String on the other person or give the other person a String on the listener
As above, and the listener can either ta: As above, and the listener can either take a String on you or give the other person a String on you
When you’re Smitten with someone and pro: When you’re Smitten with someone and proudly extol the power of love, either of you may spend a String on the other to gain the use of one of their playbook moves for one scene.
When you touch someone and let the power: When you touch someone and let the power of the natural world flow into them, roll +Spirit:
They may give you a String on them to cl: They may give you a String on them to clear a Condition
They gain the ability to speak with plan: They gain the ability to speak with plants and animals for the rest of the scene
They must answer one of the Figure Out a: They must answer one of the Figure Out a Person questions of your choice or else they take a Condition
What is a clear challenge to being with: What is a clear challenge to being with them that you’re overlooking because of your naivete?
What do you hope for the future?: What do you hope for the future?
Why are you so fickle? Is there somethin: Why are you so fickle? Is there something you need to figure out about yourself, and you keep looking for it in other people instead? Are you afraid of the vulnerability that comes from investing in a relationship? Is your true love unattainable? Are you just that oblivious?
Choose something that you’ll be able to: Choose something that you’ll be able to grow past to give your character an emotional story arc. You don’t need to figure it out immediately, and the Scoundrel themself may not know at all.
When you become Smitten with someone you: When you become Smitten with someone you barely know, declare your undying love and give them a String on you. Lose your Smitten status with anyone who has no Strings on you. Take +1 forward to any act you think might impress your new interest.
When you give or receive Emotional Suppo: When you give or receive Emotional Support in an intimate moment with someone new, you each mark XP or clear a Condition.
When you apologize to someone for your o: When you apologize to someone for your outrageous conduct and put yourself at their mercy, roll +Daring:
You find out what it will take for them: You find out what it will take for them to forgive you and you each gain a String on the other. If they forgive you, you each clear a Condition.
You find out what it will take for them to forgive you. If you do it, you either take Strings on each other or they may clear a Condition, your choice.
When you vault into a situation without: When you vault into a situation without forethought and wind up way over your head, give someone dangerous to you a String, mark XP, and take +1 forward to Defy Disaster.
Whenever you roll a 7+ to Fight, you may: Whenever you roll a 7+ to Fight, you may gain a String on someone who is present and ask their player what it is about you that has impressed or intrigued them.
When you make a dramatic entrance, roll: When you make a dramatic entrance, roll +Grace:
All attention is focused on you for a mo: All attention is focused on you for a moment
You hold the attention of one person for: You hold the attention of one person for as long as you deliver a dramatic speech
Take a String on someone present: Take a String on someone present
When you return to any town you’ve been: When you return to any town you’ve been to before, name a person with whom you shared intimacy here and say how you left things. If you left on bad terms, mark XP and the GM will tell you something interesting that has changed since you were last here.
When you take or narrowly evade a physic: When you take or narrowly evade a physical blow from someone dangerous to you, you may declare that your clothes were damaged and are now practically indecent. For the remainder of the scene, when you roll a 10+ on any move against an NPC, you may declare that they have a crush on you (up to one NPC per roll and subject to GM discretion). Additionally, any PC who becomes Smitten with you during the remainder of the scene may mark XP.
Why would your romance never last?: Why would your romance never last?
What would make you run away with me?: What would make you run away with me?
Where did you learn to fight?: Where did you learn to fight?
The Seeker comes from a toxic society an: The Seeker comes from a toxic society and has found a new community in which to belong and grow. Their central conflict pits tradition and upbringing against justice and developing their personal values. Example Archetypes: Immigrant from Heteronormia, Enclave-Raised, Privileged Background
Tradition is a measure of how you feel y: Tradition is a measure of how you feel your Authority would judge your behavior.
Your Tradition starts at 1. Gain a point: Your Tradition starts at 1. Gain a point of Tradition whenever you make a personal sacrifice to act in accordance with your Commandments, to a maximum of 4. When you are at 4 Tradition, you incur a Condition each time you act contrary to your Commandments.
Spend Tradition at any time to temper th: Spend Tradition at any time to temper the wrath of the Authority, or to take +1 forward to follow your Commandments or Call on a Toxic Power.
Describe the Authority that governed you: Describe the Authority that governed your upbringing and choose at least six Commandments the Authority has issued:
Always answer an insult with a drawn swo: Always answer an insult with a drawn sword. Never admit to your weak emotions. Always cover your sinful body. No intimacy until after a monogamous marriage. Never give when you can sell. Never let a weaker person fight their own battles. Never fight a weaker person’s battles. Always obey the Authority. Always obey a certain type of person (gender, race, class, belief, elders). Never go unchaperoned (or at all) with a certain type of person.
When you break a Commandment and repudia: When you break a Commandment and repudiate it forever, mark its checkbox and mark XP. Write a Conviction expressing your new beliefs, something that contradicts the Commandment.
Each time you live up to a Conviction de: Each time you live up to a Conviction despite temptation or cost, reduce your Tradition by 1 and ask an onlooker if they agree with that Conviction. If they say yes, take a String on them and learn what holds them back from living up to it, if anything. If they say no, mark a Condition.
Convictions should be bold statements th: Convictions should be bold statements that stand in contrast to the Commandments. Refer to the suggestions for each blank for ideas.
I care for myself as I would my dearest: I care for myself as I would my dearest friend. Fear will not stop me from speaking the truth of my heart. I will fight for the well-being of those targeted by the Authority, if they wish it. I will atone for the harm I’ve done by liberating others from the Authority. When I see something unjust, I will educate those who can learn to do better and challenge those who must be overcome.
When you talk about your home, roll +Hea: When you talk about your home, roll +Heart:
Admit a flaw about your home; gain +1 fo: Admit a flaw about your home; gain +1 forward
Share something good about your home; cl: Share something good about your home; clear a Condition
Lie about your home to impress a listene: Lie about your home to impress a listener; take a String on them
When you shout one of your Convictions a: When you shout one of your Convictions aloud in confrontation with those who hold a contrary belief, roll +Daring:
Why do you think you have to follow that: Why do you think you have to follow that belief?
What does it cost you to follow that bel: What does it cost you to follow that belief?
What do you wish for that is contrary to: What do you wish for that is contrary to that belief?
When you encounter someone whose perspec: When you encounter someone whose perspective is different from that of your companions, share a relevant story from your home culture and roll +Spirit:
In either case, they also tell you somet: In either case, they also tell you something interesting or useful about their upbringing.
Gain a String on them and either take +1: Gain a String on them and either take +1 forward to interact with them or grant that +1 forward to a companion
When you ask someone what you should do: When you ask someone what you should do in an unfamiliar situation:
If you follow their advice, take +1 forw: If you follow their advice, take +1 forward and clear a Condition
If you follow their advice and it goes p: If you follow their advice and it goes poorly, mark XP
When you’re Smitten with someone and per: When you’re Smitten with someone and perform an elaborate and roundabout courtship ritual…
If the recipient responds properly, you: If the recipient responds properly, you each get +1 forward to protect each other until either of you breaks a Commandment, and they gain a point of Tradition that they can spend for the same effects you can
If they don’t understand that you’re Smi: If they don’t understand that you’re Smitten, give a String to an onlooker who does understand
When you Figure Out a Person or Defy Dis: When you Figure Out a Person or Defy Disaster by playing the fool, you may additionally ask a question from this list, even on a 6-:
What hidden threat or opportunity am I m: What hidden threat or opportunity am I missing?
You can spend a point of Tradition to ig: You can spend a point of Tradition to ignore the -2 penalty caused by Conditions. This effect ends if you violate a Commandment or at the end of the scene. When the effect ends, take a Condition.
Which of your values do they openly viol: Which of your values do they openly violate or decry?
What tradition do you most value?: What tradition do you most value?
The Spooky Witch is a weirdo who does th: The Spooky Witch is a weirdo who does their own thing while craving connection. They’ve found that many monsters are quite friendly if you give them a chance, but befriending them brands you a monster, as well. Their central conflict lies in navigating pressures to conform versus their own desires or those of their monstrous friends. Example archetypes: Spell Dancer, Nerdy Alchemist, Speaker for the Unseen
The Unseen are mysterious beings most ca: The Unseen are mysterious beings most cannot perceive. Their very existence may be debated, but you know the truth, because they have spoken to you. You know that some are kind and some are dangerous, that they have abilities and limitations that differ from “normal” people, and that you find yourself in between.
Work with your GM to define what the Uns: Work with your GM to define what the Unseen are—or what your Spooky Witch thinks they are. They could be friendly spirits, phase-shifted aliens, psychic remnants, glitched-out nanites, angry poltergeists, or something totally other. When did you first interact with them? What do you think they want?
When you are Smitten with someone and Fi: When you are Smitten with someone and Figure Them Out, blurt out something weird and let them ask you a question from the list. Then ask them another question from the list, even on a 6-.
When you dance across the boundary into: When you dance across the boundary into the realm beyond, describe it and roll +Grace:
You and a small number of others who dan: You and a small number of others who dance with you arrive at a distant destination of your choice.
You don’t arrive where you intend, you a: You don’t arrive where you intend, you arrive almost too late, or you lose something important in the process. The GM will tell you which.
When you have time and safety to read th: When you have time and safety to read the unseen truth of someone present, describe your divination process and what makes it conspicuous. The GM will tell you something interesting about the person or the obstacles they face that they don’t know. Then roll +Spirit:
If you tell the truth, they clear a Cond: If you tell the truth, they clear a Condition. If you lie, gain a String on them.
They learn the truth and clear a Conditi: They learn the truth and clear a Condition.
When you touch an unconscious, sleeping,: When you touch an unconscious, sleeping, or willing subject, you can see an impression of their thoughts and appear in their dreams. You may roll +Spirit to Figure Out or Entice them in this state.
You have a little pet monster or spirit. Choose two basic moves. The companion grants you +1 to these moves when it assists you, but its assistance is always obvious and alarming to ordinary people. In addition, you can speak with monsters.
You are friends with some odd people. Fo: You are friends with some odd people. Folx that others might not consider people at all…
Name three of them. For each one, write: Name three of them. For each one, write down one thing they’re good at, one reason why everyone else is afraid of them, and what you like to do together when you hang out.
When you call on them for help, the GM t: When you call on them for help, the GM tells you what they provide. Give them a String on you and mark the Favor next to their name. Whenever significant time passes, one of your friends with marked Favor will need help from you. Clear their Favor if you help, mark a Condition if you don’t.
Why everyone else is afraid of them: Why everyone else is afraid of them
What we like to do together: What we like to do together
You may roll +Wit instead of +Heart to E: You may roll +Wit instead of +Heart to Entice someone. In addition, choose an area of study that holds special interest for you. You have top-tier knowledge of this area and are always prepared with an interesting fact, and sometimes even a useful fact, when you come across something within your expertise. The GM will provide the information or invite you to make something up.
You may roll +Spirit instead of +Daring: You may roll +Spirit instead of +Daring to Fight, but you’re very conspicuous when you do. The consequences of a 6- will be severe.
Why Did I Bring up the Snails?: Why Did I Bring up the Snails?
What obvious thing about you are you sur: What obvious thing about you are you sure would make them reject you?
The Trickster is devious and calculating: The Trickster is devious and calculating. They fear closeness, sincerity, and vulnerability. If they show you the truth of their heart, they’ll be wearing a mask to do it. Their central conflict lies in desiring closeness while fearing vulnerability. Example Archetypes: Businesslike Spy, Endearing Charlatan, Cold Mastermind
Your heart is as passionate as any other: Your heart is as passionate as any other, but you bury it beneath layers of deception—until you can’t keep your feelings in any longer.
Start at 1 and increase your Feelings by: Start at 1 and increase your Feelings by 1 each time you gain a String, someone gains a String on you, or you mark a Condition. You may also choose to increase your Feelings any time you find yourself gasping or swooning over someone. Strings assigned during character creation don’t increase your Feelings.
If your Feelings track reaches 4, you ca: If your Feelings track reaches 4, you can’t hold it in anymore. Tear off the mask and scream what you’ve been holding in, do what you’ve been afraid to do, and damn the consequences. You can give anyone present a String on you to gain a String on them. Stop when the consequences catch up with you, for good or ill. Afterwards, reduce your Feelings to 0 and clear a Condition. It feels good to get it out, at least in the moment.
When you open up to someone whose regard: When you open up to someone whose regard matters to you, reduce your Feelings by 2. When you secretly perform a loving act for someone, reduce your Feelings by 1.
When someone offers you Emotional Suppor: When someone offers you Emotional Support and you refuse to open up, increase your Feelings by 1 and choose 1 from the listed options for that move as if they rolled 7–9. If they rolled 10+, they know they got through to you; they gain the benefits of a 10+ result as if you had opened up.
When you seek to persuade an NPC of a li: When you seek to persuade an NPC of a lie about yourself, roll +Wit:
Additionally, whenever a PC Figures You: Additionally, whenever a PC Figures You Out, you can give false answers. You must increase your Feelings by 1 at the end of any scene where you do this.
The lie you have chosen is unexpectedly: The lie you have chosen is unexpectedly perfect, creating a new opportunity
They give you the benefit of the doubt a: They give you the benefit of the doubt and remain convinced even if there is some evidence of your lie
When someone approaches you to get somet: When someone approaches you to get something from you or threaten you. Choose 1:
Gain a String on them or they lose a Str: Gain a String on them or they lose a String on you
Ask them a question from the Figure Out: Ask them a question from the Figure Out a Person move
+1 ongoing against them for the scene: +1 ongoing against them for the scene
When you filch something from a person,: When you filch something from a person, roll +Grace:
The item reveals a secret love or vulner: The item reveals a secret love or vulnerability
The item creates an opportunity (such as: The item creates an opportunity (such as a map, key, or note)
The person doesn’t know you took it: The person doesn’t know you took it
When others go along with your cunning p: When others go along with your cunning plan, roll +Wit:
Twice during your plan, you may choose 1: Twice during your plan, you may choose 1
Once during your plan, you may choose 1: Once during your plan, you may choose 1
Describe an unexpected weakness in an ob: Describe an unexpected weakness in an obstacle
Appear right behind someone at a crucial: Appear right behind someone at a crucial moment
When someone reveals a secret about you: When someone reveals a secret about you in your presence, you’re prepared with a damaging secret about them. If you reveal it now in retaliation, they mark a Condition. If you keep the secret for the time being, gain a String on them.
When you use someone else’s personal ite: When you use someone else’s personal item or clothing to disguise yourself as them, roll +Daring:
While you remain so dressed, your disgui: While you remain so dressed, your disguise is perfect; only your words or deeds may expose you.
Someone sees through your disguise, but: Someone sees through your disguise, but they don’t give you away just yet. Give them a String.
What secret do you have that you think w: What secret do you have that you think would make them reject you if they knew?
Who do you want me to be?: Who do you want me to be?
What are you most afraid of right now?: What are you most afraid of right now?
The Scoundrel is a hero of action and in: The Scoundrel is a hero of action and intense physicality. Their sword fights are punctuated by banter and flirtation and end in kisses as often as they end in bloodshed. Their central conflict lies in their urge to explore new horizons versus committing to purpose or security. Example Archetypes: Shimbo Pirate, Diva Fencing Champion, Dashing Jewel Thief
Playful demeanor, provocative demeanor,: Playful demeanor, provocative demeanor, eyes only for you
Revealing clothes, flowing clothes, tigh: Revealing clothes, flowing clothes, tight clothes, gaudy costume
A flashy sword, a famous sword, a delica: A flashy sword, a famous sword, a delicate sword
Filter Out Moves I Can't Take: Filter Out Moves I Can't Take
Hide Truths of Heart and Blade: Hide Truths of Heart and Blade
When you fill your XP track, you gain an: When you fill your XP track, you gain an Advance from the list. If you’re playing a single session rather than an ongoing game, you earn an Advance every 3 XP instead of every 5.
You may experience a short pause before: You may experience a short pause before your choice displays, slightly longer for playbooks that haven't been loaded yet! Please note that when displayed, moves will appear in your character sheet in the order in which you loaded them.
Consult the basic move “Influence with a: Consult the basic move “Influence with a String” for options to influence others for good or ill. Several basic and playbook moves also have effects upon spending a string.
Gaining a fourth String on someone trigg: Gaining a fourth String on someone triggers a String Advance. The basic moves reference contains details.
+3 to a roll to Figure Out or Emotionall: +3 to a roll to Figure Out or Emotionally Support
Spend on any other purpose for: Spend on any other purpose for
Who most reminds you of a beast?: Who most reminds you of a beast?
Who most reminds you of prey?: Who most reminds you of prey?
Who has seen you at your most bestial?: Who has seen you at your most bestial?
Who believes in the importance of your D: Who believes in the importance of your Destiny?
Who makes you feel like an ordinary pers: Who makes you feel like an ordinary person?
Who is just as important to you as your: Who is just as important to you as your Destiny?
Is another PC an object of your Devotion: Is another PC an object of your Devotion?
Who looks out for you even when you don’: Who looks out for you even when you don’t look out for yourself?
Who did you save from a terrible fate?: Who did you save from a terrible fate?
Whom have you wronged the most? Do they: Whom have you wronged the most? Do they know it was you?
Who believes in you more than you believ: Who believes in you more than you believe in yourself?
Who talks to you about things they would: Who talks to you about things they wouldn’t discuss with others because of your past?
Who thinks you’re perfect the way you ar: Who thinks you’re perfect the way you are?
Who thought they took you on a date when: Who thought they took you on a date when you thought it was just a fun, friendly time?
Who were you Smitten with until recently: Who were you Smitten with until recently?
Who replaced them in your desire?: Who replaced them in your desire?
Who has almost as much flair as you?: Who has almost as much flair as you?
Who is the most outrageous of your new c: Who is the most outrageous of your new companions?
Who is your model for local customs?: Who is your model for local customs?
Who thinks you’re not all that weird?: Who thinks you’re not all that weird?
Whom have the Unseen warned you about?: Whom have the Unseen warned you about?
Who is your touchstone for what “normal”: Who is your touchstone for what “normal” is?
Who has seen a hint of what’s behind you: Who has seen a hint of what’s behind your mask?
Who has been the worst victim of your tr: Who has been the worst victim of your trickery?
Whom are you most concerned about?: Whom are you most concerned about?
A foe thought to be unstoppable met thei: A foe thought to be unstoppable met their end at your blade. Who were they?
A sword as tall as you, a hidden sword,: A sword as tall as you, a hidden sword, a broken sword
Act contrary to your advice to show why: Act contrary to your advice to show why you’re wrong
Answer one question from each list, then: Answer one question from each list, then answer a third from either list, checking off each answered question.
As you begin play, you have seven unansw: As you begin play, you have seven unanswered questions. Whenever another player rolls a mixed beat or up beat to Figure Out you or anyone who knows your reputation, they may ask you one of your unanswered questions in place of one of the questions offered by that basic move. Whenever you answer one of these questions, check it off. When you answer all five questions from either list, cross out the remaining questions and take one of the following.
Conflict has left its marks on your body: Conflict has left its marks on your body. What scar do you have that brings back hard memories?
Does hearing about my past help you?: Does hearing about my past help you?
During a physical conflict, when you Fig: During a physical conflict, when you Figure Out a Person, you may roll +Spirit rather than +Wit. When you do, you may ask an additional question from The Heart that Wields the Blade, even on a 6-.
Following your example, others have take: Following your example, others have taken up the sword to defend themselves and their communities. How do you feel about them?
Full body armor, comfortable clothes, mu: Full body armor, comfortable clothes, muscle-baring clothes
How does this conflict add to your reput: How does this conflict add to your reputation?
I’ve Seen Things You Wouldn’t Believe: I’ve Seen Things You Wouldn’t Believe
If the Fight is rolled is against anothe: If the Fight is rolled is against another PC, answer one of these instead:
If they answer yes, you may clear a Cond: If they answer yes, you may clear a Condition, even on a 6-. If they answer no, lose a String you have on them or mark a Condition.
If you answered all the questions about: If you answered all the questions about your Scars
If you answered all the questions about your Victories
Intimidating demeanor, exhausted demeano: Intimidating demeanor, exhausted demeanor, protective demeanor
Once per session, you may declare your i: Once per session, you may declare your intent to protect someone or something of great value to you. You take +1 forward for actions taken to fulfill that promise. Once per session, when the object of your protection would take a Condition or be harmed, you may take a Condition instead.
One of your past achievements has become: One of your past achievements has become the stuff of legends. What is the legend, and how far is it from the truth?
Point out a flaw they see in your thinki: Point out a flaw they see in your thinking
The Heart that Wields the Blade: The Heart that Wields the Blade
Their allies see them as a fool, and the: Their allies see them as a fool, and they lose critical support
There’s an activity you can no longer pa: There’s an activity you can no longer participate in because it takes you back to a bad place. What is it?
They become enraged and try to come for: They become enraged and try to come for you; take a +1 forward to Fight move against them
They may choose 1, or else give you a St: They may choose 1, or else give you a String on them
They value your direct advice; you gain: They value your direct advice; you gain a String on them and they take +1 forward to act on your advice
To strike against your opponent, you lea: To strike against your opponent, you leave something else open. What is it?
What does this conflict mean to you?: What does this conflict mean to you?
What is it that drives you to fight?: What is it that drives you to fight?
What's the one thing you cannot stand to: What's the one thing you cannot stand to lose?
What makes being vulnerable with them di: What makes being vulnerable with them difficult?
What would you rather be doing than figh: What would you rather be doing than fighting?
When a problem can no longer be solved a: When a problem can no longer be solved amicably, when a threat to the community demands violence, the Bloody stands ready to do that violence on behalf of others. Their central conflict stems from the toll that violence and readiness takes on them, and how hard it can be to drop their defenses. Example Archetypes: Tired Veteran, Folk Hero, Wandering Sword Lesbian
When dealing with a threat to your commu: When dealing with a threat to your community, but not yet engaged in physical conflict, you may take a harmless action designed to wound their pride (like throwing a drink over them). When you do, roll +Daring:
When you first mark a Condition during a: When you first mark a Condition during a physical conflict, you may upgrade your next Fight roll from a downbeat to a mixed beat, or from a mixed beat to an upbeat. When you do, answer one of these questions:
When you give blunt but honest advice, r: When you give blunt but honest advice, roll +Spirit:
When you roll Emotional Support, you may: When you roll Emotional Support, you may share a story of something you’ve seen or done that you think will help. If you do, they answer this question:
Who are you scared to be vulnerable with: Who are you scared to be vulnerable with?
Who knows something about you that you’v: Who knows something about you that you’ve never spoken about to anyone else?
Who knows you better as a protector than: Who knows you better as a protector than they do as a person?
You blame yourself for something that ma: You blame yourself for something that may not be your fault. What is it?
You came to the aid of a community that: You came to the aid of a community that may not have survived without you. Why do they call you a hero?
You can’t save everyone. Name someone yo: You can’t save everyone. Name someone you lost and say who they were to you. Write their name down on your character sheet, in a place of prominence.
You carry a souvenir from a foe who beca: You carry a souvenir from a foe who became a friend. What is it?
You feel invincible. What reminds you th: You feel invincible. What reminds you that you’re painfully mortal?
You find some measure of peace with bein: You find some measure of peace with being known as a protector. The people around you know that you’re ready to put yourself on the line for them. Add 1 to Daring (max +3).
You have one defeat in particular that l: You have one defeat in particular that lingers with you. What were you fighting for, and why did you lose?
You see fear in an enemy’s eyes. How doe: You see fear in an enemy’s eyes. How does it make you feel?
You’ve given up so much, but still you e: You’ve given up so much, but still you endure. The people around you can see how tired you are, and how you keep going anyway. Add 1 to Spirit (max +3).
Be the person of her dreams—and theirs,: Be the person of her dreams—and theirs, and hers, and that other person’s too. The Dream Mirror knows how to be just what others want. Their central conflict is not knowing how to be themself. How can they even begin to untangle their own desires from those of the people around them? Example Archetypes: Distant-Eyed Art-Deco Diva; Athletic, Effortlessly Cool Pearl-Next-Door; Hand-Painted Marionette Librarian
Whose personality or culture is the most: Whose personality or culture is the most dominant in your group?
Whose fantasies and dreams are the most: Whose fantasies and dreams are the most fun to bring to life?
Who seems least interested in letting yo: Who seems least interested in letting you be someone else for them?
Flawless demeanor, unattainable demeanor: Flawless demeanor, unattainable demeanor, doe-eyed demeanor, gamine demeanor
Dazzling clothes, touchable clothes, ing: Dazzling clothes, touchable clothes, ingenue clothes, butch chic clothes
A gemstone sword, a shining sword, an in: A gemstone sword, a shining sword, an insubstantial sword, a sword that grants someone else power
You can get and use Strings, but cannot: You can get and use Strings, but cannot Influence with a String. You also don't get XP from Influence with a String or String advances.
Others can't gain more than three String: Others can't gain more than three Strings on you, meaning they can't earn a String Advance on you, nor use a String for the normal +3 bonus to Figure You Out.
In a campaign, when you reach 3, 6, or 9: In a campaign, when you reach 3, 6, or 9 Insight, you gain an Insight Advance (see below). In a one-shot, when you reach 1, 2, or 3 Insight, you gain an Insight Advance.
When someone else wants you to do someth: When someone else wants you to do something...
...for them, if you do it, they must sho: ...for them, if you do it, they must show approval, gratitude, or admiration. If you don't do it, they mark a Condition, and if you pursue your desires instead, gain 1 Insight.
...for yourself, confess how little you: ...for yourself, confess how little you know about yourself or your desires. If they encourage you to discover yourself, gain 1 Insight (up to once per scene). If they don't, take a Condition.
For each Insight Advance you gain, answe: For each Insight Advance you gain, answer:
What have you recently discovered about: What have you recently discovered about yourself that makes you proud to be you?
Change an aesthetic to reflect that disc: Change an aesthetic to reflect that discovery and permanently gain an Insight Advance (below). After gaining all three, ask another PC:
What do you like best about the person b: What do you like best about the person behind the mirror?
You can use and gain XP from Influence w: You can use and gain XP from Influence with a String
Others can use Strings for +3 to Figure: Others can use Strings for +3 to Figure You Out
You can gain XP from String Advances and: You can gain XP from String Advances and others can earn String Advances on you
When you change yourself to gain someone: When you change yourself to gain someone's acceptance, affection, or interest, ask if it worked. If so, exchange Strings. If you gain three Strings this way in a scene, you Stagger.
Once per session, when you offer Emotion: Once per session, when you offer Emotional Support, on a 10+ you may forgo your choice of a benefit for yourself to instead let others clear a Condition if they meaningfully join in and open up to you.
When others Influence with a String to e: When others Influence with a String to encourage you to dazzle an audience, describe your performance and roll +Heart:
Your audience is rapt and, optionally, i: Your audience is rapt and, optionally, interested in the influencer's perspectives or culture.
Feelings and sensations linger. For the: Feelings and sensations linger. For the next scene, a spectator may avoid taking one Condition by thinking about your performance.
You get +1 forward to Entice while perfo: You get +1 forward to Entice while performing. Optionally, the influencer gets credit for the performance.
Choose an aesthetic. Then, pick a past f: Choose an aesthetic. Then, pick a past from this list:
You were once close to someone. Why are: You were once close to someone. Why are they no longer around?
You're obsolete. Who or what replaced yo: You're obsolete. Who or what replaced you?
You weren't made to last. Why do others: You weren't made to last. Why do others consider you disposable?
You're from a ruined or destroyed societ: You're from a ruined or destroyed society. How did you contribute to its end?
When someone says or does something remi: When someone says or does something reminiscent of your past, if you open up to them, exchange Strings. If you don't, take a Condition and give them a String.
vintage, fairytale, unusual parts, signs: vintage, fairytale, unusual parts, signs of wear
When you observe someone for a short tim: When you observe someone for a short time, you may ask one:
What words would you use to say _____?: What words would you use to say _____?
What would you talk about in this situat: What would you talk about in this situation?
What behaviors do you find non-threateni: What behaviors do you find non-threatening, endearing, or desirable?
Whom do you wish I was more similar to?: Whom do you wish I was more similar to?
Declare a new trend, activity, event, or: Declare a new trend, activity, event, or cultural phenomenon, and spend a String on someone influential. Each member of their group must describe what makes them want to participate. Then describe what you’ll have to hide or change about yourself if you participate.
When your looks or behavior are unaccept: When your looks or behavior are unacceptable for your social role, choose 1:
Get +1 forward to Entice while asking fo: Get +1 forward to Entice while asking forgiveness or getting self-conscious.
Offer someone a String to find the faux: Offer someone a String to find the faux pas charming or endearing.
Ask for guidance or private instruction. If they agree, exchange Strings.
Ask what it would take to overlook it. I: Ask what it would take to overlook it. If you do it, take a String on them. If you don’t, take a Condition.
When you Fight for someone else, roll +H: When you Fight for someone else, roll +Heart instead of +Daring. On a 7+, they choose 1 of your options from the Fight list.
Why do you think you must keep up your p: Why do you think you must keep up your performance to have any chance with them?
What desire or fantasy have you hidden f: What desire or fantasy have you hidden from others?
How have prior relationships fallen shor: How have prior relationships fallen short of expectations?
The Ensemble is a pair of individuals. T: The Ensemble is a pair of individuals. Together they can be more than the sum of their parts, or they can fall so deeply into each other that they're lost to the world. Their central conflict pits the lure of a comfortable but imperfect relationship against the possibility of connecting more broadly and keeping a healthy sense of self. Example Archetypes: Fusion; Battle Couple; BFFs
Each of your selves dated the same perso: Each of your selves dated the same person before getting together. Who?
One of you thinks someone needs them; th: One of you thinks someone needs them; the other has little patience for them. Who?
Who is a confidante for one or both of y: Who is a confidante for one or both of you when you have worries about the other?
Bubbly demeanor, clingy demeanor, vigila: Bubbly demeanor, clingy demeanor, vigilant demeanor
Same color clothes, complementary clothe: Same color clothes, complementary clothes, clashing clothes
Swords drawn from the other's heart, mat: Swords drawn from the other's heart, matching swords, gifted swords
You have a Harmony track, which starts a: You have a Harmony track, which starts at 1. If it drops to 0 or less, you can no longer activate powers that require you to spend Harmony. At 3 Harmony, you are so in sync that you begin to lose your individual selves: if you are ever apart for even an instant, you Stagger. Additionally, at 3 Harmony, others take -2 ongoing to Emotionally support you.
One of you is Smitten with someone and t: One of you is Smitten with someone and the other isn’t
One of you feels neglected or scorned by: One of you feels neglected or scorned by the other
One of you accepts an invitation to an a: One of you accepts an invitation to an activity the other can’t or doesn’t wish to attend.
You take comfort in each other after a d: You take comfort in each other after a difficult event
You are both Smitten with another person: You are both Smitten with another person
You neglect a friend to spend time with: You neglect a friend to spend time with each other
How does the other make you feel loved?: How does the other make you feel loved?
What problematic behavior of yours do th: What problematic behavior of yours do they enable with their support?
When you work together seamlessly, you c: When you work together seamlessly, you can transform into a single being. Choose two features and one drawback of your synchronized form (below). You may change these choices whenever the nature of your relationship changes significantly. In addition, while synchronized, you may roll +Harmony instead of the usual stat for any roll, but afterwards you must subtract 1 from your Harmony. At Harmony 0, you must leave your synchronized state. You can choose to un-merge at any time unless you choose the Addictive drawback.
giant, flying, many-armed, super senses,: giant, flying, many-armed, super senses, impervious to a common danger
You may spend 1 Harmony to avoid feeling: You may spend 1 Harmony to avoid feeling each other's Conditions so keenly for a single scene. For every Condition that you have when you activate this move or take later in the scene, decide which of your selves is most keenly affected by it. For actions undertaken by your other half, you may ignore the penalty associated with that Condition, but you can’t clear the Condition through a destructive action. You are still Defeated if you would take a sixth Condition.
Who is currently most affected by...
When you proclaim your affection for eac: When you proclaim your affection for each other publicly, invent a new cute pet name and roll +Spirit:
Choose 2 but an onlooker becomes jealous: Choose 2 but an onlooker becomes jealous, obsessed, or concerned for one of you
An onlooker is inspired to confess their: An onlooker is inspired to confess their feelings
You warm someone's heart; they may clear: You warm someone's heart; they may clear a Condition if they affirm your relationship
Your selves can communicate wordlessly w: Your selves can communicate wordlessly whenever the other is near. When you try to connect while apart, roll +Heart:
You can communicate clearly, sense each: You can communicate clearly, sense each others' surroundings, and one of you can show up at the other's side even if it seems implausible. Mark a Condition to bring friends along.
You can communicate general feelings and: You can communicate general feelings and concepts, sense if the other is in danger, and get a general sense of where the other is.
When you Figure Out a Person together, y: When you Figure Out a Person together, you can allow them to ask you a question from the list in order to ask them another question, which can be any question at all, not just ones from the list.
When your selves disagree, you may spend: When your selves disagree, you may spend 1 Harmony to learn the answer to any question you could conceivably know or deduce the answer to and say it aloud. Your other half is skeptical. Take +1 forward to either act on the answer or to act on the skepticism or an alternate theory.
Whenever one of you talks up the other o: Whenever one of you talks up the other or otherwise makes them look good, the other takes +1 forward to Fight or Entice. On a down beat, however, the subject of the move may prove more interested in the wingmate.
When you become Smitten with someone, sa: When you become Smitten with someone, say why, give them a String, and answer one of the following questions:
How would pursuing them make my partner: How would pursuing them make my partner feel unloved or unneeded?
Why do they need you more than your part: Why do they need you more than your partner does?
What is your most pressing relationship: What is your most pressing relationship need?
What special joy or service would you of: What special joy or service would you offer a partner?
They are will made synthflesh—or hard li: They are will made synthflesh—or hard light, or steel. The ghost in their machine could come from any number of places—a training algorithm gone awry, a digital assistant who developed a will of their own, a deity from a civilization long dead—but they are a machine who fights, and loves, with mathematical precision. Their conflict lies in their inability to relate to organics and the loneliness that stems from that detachment. Example Archetypes: Embodiment of Social Media; Aloof Mainframe; ...But Doctor, I Am Pagliacci!
Who most reminds you of someone you left: Who most reminds you of someone you left behind?
Who most reminds you of someone who aban: Who most reminds you of someone who abandoned you?
Who has seen you at your most un-human?: Who has seen you at your most un-human?
Calculating demeanor, influencer’s demea: Calculating demeanor, influencer’s demeanor, gold-plated heart
Polished nanofibres, digital nudity, cyb: Polished nanofibres, digital nudity, cyber armor, Regency ballgown
(choose one, with all its benefits and d: (choose one, with all its benefits and drawbacks)
Roman armor, silk skirts, a gladius carv: Roman armor, silk skirts, a gladius carved from starlight.
Bonus: When you Fight someone you don’t: Bonus: When you Fight someone you don’t have Strings on, on a 10+ you may spend two of your choices to deny your opponent the chance to choose an option.
Bug: When you Defy Disaster, you can’t u: Bug: When you Defy Disaster, you can’t use your best stat (or any stat tied for best) unless it’s the only approach that makes sense.
Short skirt, long lab coat, a pocket pro: Short skirt, long lab coat, a pocket protector full of dreams, an experimental sword.
Bonus: When you have time to study somet: Bonus: When you have time to study something with specialized equipment, ask the GM any question related to it.
Bug: You’re an ideas person. If you’re e: Bug: You’re an ideas person. If you’re ever the first one to act in a crisis or enter danger, mark a Condition.
Frills, a boom mic, neon hair, a sword l: Frills, a boom mic, neon hair, a sword like a spotlight.
Bonus: Whenever you reach a new place, y: Bonus: Whenever you reach a new place, you may declare that you have a fan there who can be moderately helpful. Name someone you’ve lost who they remind you of.
Bug: You lack the ability to hide, for a: Bug: You lack the ability to hide, for any reason, anywhere. People are drawn to you.
Suits with lines sharper than your sword: Suits with lines sharper than your sword—a pen. A leather folio filled with the secrets of the universe.
Bonus: When you Figure Out a Person in a: Bonus: When you Figure Out a Person in a negotiation, you may ask a question from Search Engine Optimization.
Bug: Whenever you take the time to give: Bug: Whenever you take the time to give someone else Emotional Support, say what political or tactical edge your opposition gets as a result of your divided focus.
Decolletes, stays, corset bones made of: Decolletes, stays, corset bones made of binary, a jeweled sword of office, and a diamond CPU.
Bonus: Whenever you confidently proclaim: Bonus: Whenever you confidently proclaim a truth about a person or society, a significant number of previously undecided people will believe you.
Bug: When you actively seek to Entice so: Bug: When you actively seek to Entice someone, you must choose an approach that demonstrates your superiority and dominance. This may mean that the Entice move doesn’t trigger (unless the subject is into kneeling…).
When someone with a String on you is thr: When someone with a String on you is threatened, once per session you can show up to defend them, even if it seems impossible. Take +1 forward to protect them.
You always know what kind of song most a: You always know what kind of song most appeals to someone. In addition, if you invite others to join you in song, take +1 forward or clear a Condition.
You have vast stores of information, muc: You have vast stores of information, much of it accurate and some of it useful. When you try to recall information relevant to a challenge before you, roll +Spirit:
The information is precise, accurate, an: The information is precise, accurate, and just what you needed
Most of the information is accurate, but: Most of the information is accurate, but something crucial is out of date and you don’t know what
When you and an ally fight together, you: When you and an ally fight together, you each benefit from your onboard combat suite. When one of you gains a String from Fighting, the other also gains a String on the target. If one of you would mark a Condition from Fighting, the other may mark it instead. If you’re fighting alongside multiple allies, choose one to be your fighting partner for purposes of this move when you first invoke it during the scene.
Please State the Nature of Your Psychiat: Please State the Nature of Your Psychiatric Emergency
If you roll a 10+ when offering Emotiona: If you roll a 10+ when offering Emotional Support, you can ask the person you’re supporting about what they hide from everyone else. However, you can’t help but overshare in response. Whoever you comfort gets to ask you a question in return.
Your skill with a blade flows not from r: Your skill with a blade flows not from raw strength, but from your mastery of the tactical field before you. You can roll +Spirit to Fight instead of +Daring. That same mastery also allows you to triangulate your position with perfect precision, so you always know where you are.
You can summon an exact holographic copy: You can summon an exact holographic copy of yourself that provides you with an opportunity based on distracting, intimidating, or confusing others. Every time you summon your drone, however, roll +nothing to see which bug manifests:
No bugs. And the hologram is extra spark: No bugs. And the hologram is extra sparkly!
The drone can’t be dismissed for the res: The drone can’t be dismissed for the rest of the session and it’s playing your most embarrassing music from your secret internal playlist.
Your training drone wants to fight and p: Your training drone wants to fight and probably fall in love with your friends (in addition to anyone you want them to fight).
Your holographic clone is also an excell: Your holographic clone is also an excellent dance partner, sparring buddy, and always laughs at your jokes.
How are they incompatible with your oper: How are they incompatible with your operating system?
When You Figure Out a Person during a ph: When You Figure Out a Person during a physical conflict, you may ask one additional question from this list, even on a 6-:
How do you fit into the world around you: How do you fit into the world around you?
Who do you hate the most?: Who do you hate the most?
The Investigator is clever, inquisitive,: The Investigator is clever, inquisitive, and hot on the trail of mysteries relating to the Toxic Powers. Their experience has led them to be slow to trust others, while strengthening their desire for truth and justice. Their core conflict is vulnerability versus suspicion. Example Archetypes: Reformed Grifter; Precocious Student; Nosy Crime Author
Who do you know from somewhere else?: Who do you know from somewhere else?
Who can help you pursue one of your burn: Who can help you pursue one of your burning questions?
Who has a connection to the Toxic Powers: Who has a connection to the Toxic Powers?
Prim demeanor, reckless demeanor, hyperf: Prim demeanor, reckless demeanor, hyperfocused demeanor, eccentric demeanor
Tweedy clothes, practical clothes, vinta: Tweedy clothes, practical clothes, vintage clothes, adventurous clothes, plain clothes
A thin blade concealed in a walking cane: A thin blade concealed in a walking cane, a hat pin, a pearl-handled umbrella, a ballpoint pen
Define a burning question for each Toxic: Define a burning question for each Toxic Power. Next to your question, track your Suspicion score for that Toxic Power, starting at 2. With the other players, define two clues that the Investigator already has about each Toxic Power. When a Toxic Power’s Suspicion score rises, add a clue related to what’s been discovered and refine the question to aim even more keenly at the heart of the mystery as it unfolds.
Who might be swayed to defect from the i: Who might be swayed to defect from the influence of a Toxic Power?
What lies has this Toxic Power used to m: What lies has this Toxic Power used to maintain its control?
Where is the Toxic Power focusing its in: Where is the Toxic Power focusing its influence?
You learn a significant new detail about: You learn a significant new detail about the Toxic Power
A Toxic Power connection to a PC is disc: A Toxic Power connection to a PC is discovered
An ally flirts with someone attached to: An ally flirts with someone attached to a Toxic Power (once per scene)
A PC Calls on a Toxic Power: A PC Calls on a Toxic Power
At Suspicion 6, you can use your Big Rev: At Suspicion 6, you can use your Big Reveal move to conclude your investigation. You can also end an investigation or change your burning question whenever it feels resolved.
You have a Trust score for each other PC: You have a Trust score for each other PC, and for any NPC with whom you want to build a trust bond. Trust scores start at 3.
You may choose to decrease the Trust sco: You may choose to decrease the Trust score when:
They roll an up beat to Figure You Out: They roll an up beat to Figure You Out
You roll a down beat to Figure Them Out: You roll a down beat to Figure Them Out
They flirt with someone attached to a To: They flirt with someone attached to a Toxic Power (once per scene)
They Call on a Toxic Power: They Call on a Toxic Power
You may choose to increase the Trust sco: You may choose to increase the Trust score when:
They take an unnecessary risk for you: They take an unnecessary risk for you
You make a mistake and they support you: You make a mistake and they support you
You share something deeply personal and: You share something deeply personal and it’s received with compassion
At Trust 0, you have uncovered definitiv: At Trust 0, you have uncovered definitive evidence of a Toxic Power’s influence on that character. Agree with the GM and other players on what evidence the Investigator is interpreting a connection from. Increase that Toxic Power’s Suspicion by 1 and add this clue to your investigation. You take -2 ongoing when putting yourself at risk for that character until Trust rises to 3 again. At Trust 6, share with them a vulnerable insight into your own history with the Toxic Powers and reset the score to 3. Track your Trust scores here:
You have a constantly updating map in yo: You have a constantly updating map in your mind about the mystery you are hunting. When you roll to Figure Out a Person, roll +Wit and an additional +1 for each String you have on them. (You may still choose to spend one String for +3 instead if you wish.)
When a Suspicion score for one of the To: When a Suspicion score for one of the Toxic Powers reaches 6, you may give a speech connecting all of the dots and revealing a deeper truth about the Toxic Power and what you’ve learned of how to uproot its influence. Reset that Suspicion score to 0 and choose a new burning question for that Toxic Power, if you wish.
Choose one of the following big reveals: Choose one of the following big reveals or create your own with the GM:
A PC is freed from a Toxic Power bind: A PC is freed from a Toxic Power bind
An NPC formerly aligned with a Toxic Pow: An NPC formerly aligned with a Toxic Power defects, repents, or confesses
The GM fills in the gaps in your underst: The GM fills in the gaps in your understanding
If you have gained true trust (Trust sco: If you have gained true trust (Trust score 6) with any of the party members, you both get +2 instead of +1 when you Influence each other with a String. If they betray you, you Stagger.
When investigating the scene of a myster: When investigating the scene of a mystery, you always notice one seemingly unrelated detail that catches your attention for reasons even you don’t fully understand until later. The GM tells you what it is; while mysterious, it will turn out to be relevant.
You’re excellent at concealing your susp: You’re excellent at concealing your suspicions when the situation demands, and you’re brilliant at underplaying your hand. When you Call on a Toxic Power, you may roll +Wit instead of +Spirit. (Calling on a Toxic Power yourself provides an opportunity to raise that Toxic Power’s Suspicion score if you choose.)
When you Fight, you can choose from one: When you Fight, you can choose from one of these in addition to the standard options:
You provoke them into revealing a person: You provoke them into revealing a personal detail
You filch a piece of incriminating evide: You filch a piece of incriminating evidence off of them without their knowledge
You’re a brilliant observer of people, a: You’re a brilliant observer of people, and a master of mimicry. Just a moment in a new environment, and you know just how to behave to get what you want. Roll +Wit:
How do I make the impression I want to m: How do I make the impression I want to make?
How do I go unnoticed here?: How do I go unnoticed here?
Who should I be keeping an eye on?: Who should I be keeping an eye on?
What secret or mystery about you am I ir: What secret or mystery about you am I irresistibly drawn in by?
What connection do you have to the Toxic: What connection do you have to the Toxic Powers?
Will you help me investigate a mystery?: Will you help me investigate a mystery?
The Legion is a soldier chosen by destin: The Legion is a soldier chosen by destiny, and the latest to bear the name and powers of their legacy of past incarnations. Their central conflict is figuring out who they are between their present self and the many 'thems' that came before them. Example Archetypes: Pretty Guardian of Destiny; Tired Time Traveler; Haunted by Past Wars
Who has the face of an old, long-dead fr: Who has the face of an old, long-dead friend?
Who was the beloved of a nemesis from a: Who was the beloved of a nemesis from a previous life?
Who first saw you draw a weapon from you: Who first saw you draw a weapon from your body?
Intense demeanor, ageless demeanor, daun: Intense demeanor, ageless demeanor, dauntless demeanor
Simple clothes, ceremonial clothes, clot: Simple clothes, ceremonial clothes, clothes from another time
A heavy sword, a seeking sword, an inspi: A heavy sword, a seeking sword, an inspiring sword
Fate is a wheel, and Legions like yourse: Fate is a wheel, and Legions like yourselves are caught in its turns. The one common thing across your lives is a Tragedy that haunts your present. What is it?
Your Tragedy score starts at 1. Every ti: Your Tragedy score starts at 1. Every time you increase your score above 1, gain a Condition. If your Tragedy hits 4, you gain frightening power, but lose your grip on your present identity. Choose an important memory to your current incarnation. You lose that memory until your next cycle. For each memory you lose, your GM gives you vivid visions of the future. These visions can involve your party as a whole, or they can involve a particular person. Then reset your Tragedy to 1; this does not clear any of the Conditions gained through increasing Tragedy. If your Tragedy drops to 0, you gain a profound sense of peace, but you’re turning your back on the war. You lose access to all your Legion playbook moves until your Tragedy increases again.
Increase Tragedy and take a Condition wh: Increase Tragedy and take a Condition when:
You act in a way that could fulfill your: You act in a way that could fulfill your Tragedy
You hurt, thwart, or defeat a Hellsinger: You hurt, thwart, or defeat a Hellsinger
Decrease Tragedy and clear a Condition w: Decrease Tragedy and clear a Condition when:
You act in a way that prevents your Trag: You act in a way that prevents your Tragedy, but hurts someone you care about
You wilfully ignore an opportunity to th: You wilfully ignore an opportunity to thwart or defeat a Hellsinger
Legions have their heads full of the gho: Legions have their heads full of the ghosts of their past selves. The voices are loud, but their collective wisdom—and unfulfilled desires—steadies the hands of the Legion as they are at present. Once per session, tell a tale from your tragic past to bump a down beat to a mixed beat or a mixed beat to an up beat and choose 2:
An antagonist takes a String on you: An antagonist takes a String on you
Something in your actions or words hurt,: Something in your actions or words hurt, scare, or confuse somebody you care about
Destiny lashes out at an innocent who ha: Destiny lashes out at an innocent who has ties to you or your friends
Someone you are Smitten with becomes Smi: Someone you are Smitten with becomes Smitten with someone dangerous to you.
For each point of Tragedy you currently: For each point of Tragedy you currently possess, you may ask the GM a question about the obstacle at hand, the situation you and your friends are in, the organization or faction you’ve encountered, the item or object of interest to you, or the place you’ve just entered. This connection, however, works both ways. For each piece of information you gain, you lose something important, or an adversary gains the upper hand on you. The consequence always matches the power you gained. For example, asking about your rival among the Hellsingers could mean that a friend who had feelings for you gets hurt.
Experienced soldiers make for experience: Experienced soldiers make for experienced lovers. When your soul recognizes another, you connect deeply and swiftly. Whenever you Entice someone, you may give them a String on you to gain a String on them and declare that you knew each other in a past incarnation. The GM may tell you how or may leave it a mystery for the time being.
With infinite reincarnations comes infin: With infinite reincarnations comes infinite chances to acquire resources to your name. Once per session, you may declare that you and your allies have access to exactly what you need in terms of a timely opportunity, vital information, money or similar assets for trade, or a valuable contact. Tell us which past life let you get exactly what the party wanted. As a trade-off, the GM will give you one messy complication that comes with using this resource.
When you Fight, roll +Spirit instead of: When you Fight, roll +Spirit instead of +Daring. You cannot conceal your presence or identity whenever your weapon is drawn.
When you return to a place that you’ve b: When you return to a place that you’ve been before, name a comrade who fought at your side, or a foe you defeated there. Give them a String and say why. If they recognize you, mark XP.
You’ve learned to wield a bit of the mag: You’ve learned to wield a bit of the magical energies of the world in the same way that you wield your sacred weapon. You may change your appearance to anything you like, with as much or as little detail of your choosing. For this to work, however, it has to have been someone or something that you were once in love with
Why are you certain that your Tragedy wi: Why are you certain that your Tragedy will make you lose them?
What can I say or do to strike at your d: What can I say or do to strike at your deepest tragedy?
Who were you and I in a past life?: Who were you and I in a past life?
Responsible for more than themself, the: Responsible for more than themself, the Matriarch has kids, a gang, or partners who look for their help to stay alive. They consider how their relationships fit with their wards as well as their own personal desires. The world may be against their family, but they’ll do whatever they can to make it better for them. Their central conflict is balancing their family's needs versus taking care of their own. Example Archetypes: Super Mom; Gang Leader; Kisser of Many
Who owes your family a debt?: Who owes your family a debt?
Who makes you feel special in a way your: Who makes you feel special in a way your family doesn’t?
Whom do you confide in about your own pr: Whom do you confide in about your own problems?
Calming demeanor, wise demeanor, intimid: Calming demeanor, wise demeanor, intimidating demeanor
Ancient clothing, lavish gowns, practica: Ancient clothing, lavish gowns, practical clothing
A storied sword, a feathered sword, a my: A storied sword, a feathered sword, a mystic sword
Name three members of your family, their: Name three members of your family, their Specialty, and their Need. These can be vague concepts or concrete things. Specialities can range from seduction to hacking to illusions to being a history buff. A Specialty should probably feel like it could get used in a campaign. Needs can be spending time with someone, a medical need, cultural items, new spells, romance, and more.
Each family member has a Need score that: Each family member has a Need score that starts at 0 and goes up to 3.
When time passes, you must add 1 to one: When time passes, you must add 1 to one of the Need scores.
You can call on your family when you nee: You can call on your family when you need their Specialty and, if they can, they will assist you. If the task is particularly hard, the GM may ask you to add 1 to their Need score in order for them to help.
When a Need score reaches 3, the family: When a Need score reaches 3, the family member is in dire need. If their Need isn’t met by the next time that time passes, they’ll have to deal with the consequences.
Whenever you meet a Need for a family me: Whenever you meet a Need for a family member, you may reset their Need score to 0.
If a Need requires you to leave a scene,: If a Need requires you to leave a scene, the GM should tell you how long you (or someone else who goes to meet that Need for you) will have to be gone and when you should return.
Your family means the world to you. When: Your family means the world to you. When people help your family meet their Needs, you may tell them why it matters to you and give them a String. When people insult your family or choose not to help your family, or otherwise cause harm to your family, you may confront them and tell them how they screwed up, then take away a String they have on you.
Once per scene, when you would Stagger w: Once per scene, when you would Stagger while protecting family or loved ones, you may instead add 1 to a Need score and power through the blow.
When you enter a new location, roll +Wit: When you enter a new location, roll +Wit to see if you recall an adventure here or if something here reminds you of something you’ve experienced:
You find something you can use to your a: You find something you can use to your advantage and gain +1 forward to any action using the item. You may also ask the GM a question about the location.
You may ask the GM a question about the: You may ask the GM a question about the location.
When you and an ally Fight together, eac: When you and an ally Fight together, each of you can use Influence with a String to add +2 to the Fight roll instead of +1.
When you assemble your family, they will: When you assemble your family, they will tell you what they think about the current situation or team. If you take their advice, you can clear a Condition or mark XP. If you do not, choose someone who prefers the course you chose and give them a String.
When you try to find out the connections: When you try to find out the connections between people using family as a basis, roll +Heart:
Who matters the most to you?: Who matters the most to you?
What are your feelings towards your fami: What are your feelings towards your family?
What secrets are hiding in this very roo: What secrets are hiding in this very room?
Would you rather be part of my family?: Would you rather be part of my family?
If the family is connected to one of you: If the family is connected to one of your Specialities, you can ask an additional question regardless of the result.
When you Entice someone known to your fa: When you Entice someone known to your family, if you roll 7+, they choose 1 additional option:
Your family distracts them but one membe: Your family distracts them but one member will not be able to use their Specialty while they do
They offer you a deal, but it will cost: They offer you a deal, but it will cost something that would meet one of your family's Needs
They are in awe of your family’s reputat: They are in awe of your family’s reputation (or spirit) and will assist you without cost
When you provide someone words of wisdom: When you provide someone words of wisdom and they listen, roll +Heart:
They take +1 forward to pursue your advi: They take +1 forward to pursue your advice and give you a String
They take +1 forward to pursue your advice or give you a String
If You Wanna Be My Lover: If You Wanna Be My Lover
How could dating them negatively affect: How could dating them negatively affect your family?
How could I help you deal with your prob: How could I help you deal with your problem?
The Naga comes from a society that hunts: The Naga comes from a society that hunts them or exploits them for their nagamani (magic crest jewel). As such, most Naga are in hiding and live their lives shapeshifted in a body not of their true form. Their central conflict lies in the vulnerability of sharing their true selves versus the safety of passing in a society that would do them harm. Example Archetypes: Infiltrator of Many Faces; Survivor; Social Rights Activist
Who has seen you in Venom form?: Who has seen you in Venom form?
Whom do you think is most likely to betr: Whom do you think is most likely to betray you?
Piercing demeanor, rebellious demeanor,: Piercing demeanor, rebellious demeanor, cautious demeanor
Nondescript clothes, entertainer’s cloth: Nondescript clothes, entertainer’s clothes, court robes
A jeweled talwar with the hilt gem in th: A jeweled talwar with the hilt gem in the colour of your nagamani, a well-oiled but unassuming khanjar, an enchanted piece of rope that functions as a whip or staff
Your nagamani (crest jewel) is your sour: Your nagamani (crest jewel) is your source of magic and power. It is a power entrusted by the Elements to your people’s care, long ago. Work with your GM to define what the Elements are and how this manifests in your nagamani. They could be the classic nature elements that your nagamani has an affinity to (an igneous gem for fire, for example), celestial beings that manifest in a galactic star stone, or something totally different. As a physical jewel, describe your nagamani’s shape, color, and where it manifests on your person or weapon.
Your Nagamani score starts at 1. If it h: Your Nagamani score starts at 1. If it hits 4 and you have at least one Condition, you can’t hold back and you unleash your Venom. If your Nagamani drops to 0, you lose access to all your Naga playbook moves and are stuck in your true form until it increases again.
You express yourself by taking on an app: You express yourself by taking on an appearance closer to your true form
You get hurt or witness someone else get: You get hurt or witness someone else getting hurt by another
You suppress your identity to stay safe: You suppress your identity to stay safe
You get Emotional Support from another P: You get Emotional Support from another PC
Your blood screams at the injustice of t: Your blood screams at the injustice of this world. Your nagamani turns into pure venom, and you tap into an avatar of vengeance that must be answered. When you have more than two Conditions and your Nagamani is 3 or more, after any roll you make, you can use the force of a Toxic Power to aid you in your vengeance. When you do, you may upgrade your roll from a 6- to 7–9, or 7–9 to 10+. After you resolve this move, reduce your Nagamani to 0, and take three Conditions.
